Uses of Interface
rev.z.clickmodes.ClickMode

Packages that use ClickMode

Uses of ClickMode in rev.z.clickmodes
 

Classes in rev.z.clickmodes that implement ClickMode
 class FireShellMode
          Clicking in this mode will fire a cobalt shell from the active settlement.
 class PlaceRoadMode
          A mode to place roads, purchased from a source city.
 class PlaceSettlementMode
          Clicking on the map will place a new settlement, paid for by the active settlement.
 class SendGrainMode
          Clicking on the map will transfer 500 grain from the active settlement to the clicked-on settlement.
 class SendPeopleMode
          Clicking on the map will transfer 500 grain from the active settlement to the clicked-on settlement.
 class SetActiveSettlementMode
          Changes the active settlement.
 

Uses of ClickMode in rev.z.view.core
 

Methods in rev.z.view.core that return ClickMode
 ClickMode GameControllerStatus.getClickMode()
          Returns the current click mode.
 

Methods in rev.z.view.core with parameters of type ClickMode
 void GameControllerStatus.setClickMode(ClickMode mode)
          Sets the current click mode.
